# HMCharacteristicValueStatusFault.noFault

**Case**

The accessory has not experienced a fault.

## Declaration

```swift
case noFault
```

## Fault Status

- **HMCharacteristicValueStatusFault.generalFault**: The accessory experienced a general fault.

items.description: The accessory experienced a general fault.
